name: Tripping Staff, Mythic

sections.body: You add half your tier to CMD against trip maneuvers and on combat maneuver checks to trip with a quarterstaff. When you're wielding a quarterstaff and an opponent you threaten attempts to trip you and fails, it provokes an attack of opportunity from you. You must use your staff for this attack of opportunity.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your staff is valuable for attack and defensive balance.
